name: pins
title: Pins
description: Create pins for paths and URLs and display them in the menu bar
author: HelloImSteven

commands.name: index
commands.title: Show Pins
commands.description: Show pinned items in the menu bar

preferences.name: showCategories
preferences.title: General Settings
preferences.label: Show Section Labels (i.e. Pins, Groups)
preferences.description: Whether to show high-level categories in the menu dropdown.

preferences.name: showOpenAll
preferences.label: Show "Open All" Button in Groups
preferences.description: Whether to show an "Open All" item in group submenus.

preferences.name: showPinShortcut
preferences.label: Show "Quick Pins" Section
preferences.description: Whether to show the "Quick Pins" section in the menu dropdown. Quick Pins enable one-click creation of pins for active tabs, documents, folders, and more.

preferences.name: showCreateNewPin
preferences.label: Show "Create New Pin" Item
preferences.description: Whether to show a "Create New Pin" item in the menu dropdown.

preferences.name: showCopyPinData
preferences.label: Show "Copy Pin Data" Item
preferences.description: Whether to show a "Copy Pin Data" item in the menu dropdown that copies all pins and groups in JSON format.

preferences.name: showPreferences
preferences.label: Show "Preferences..." Item
preferences.description: Whether to show a "Preferences..." item in the menu dropdown. This is a useful shortcut for opening the extension preferences window, but you might prefer a more streamlined menu.

preferences.name: showInapplicablePins
preferences.label: Show Inapplicable Pins
preferences.description: Whether to show pins that are not applicable to the current context (e.g. a pin using the {{selectedText}} placeholder when no text is selected).

commands.name: new-group
commands.title: New Pin Group
commands.description: Create a new group for pins

preferences.name: showGroups
preferences.title: General Settings
preferences.label: Sort By Group
preferences.description: Whether to sort pins into group sections.

preferences.name: showSubtitles
preferences.label: Show Subtitles
preferences.description: Whether to pin targets (e.g. URLs) as subtitles in the list view.

preferences.name: showApplication
preferences.label: Show Application Icon
preferences.description: Whether to show the icon for the application that a pin opens with.

preferences.name: showCreationDate
preferences.label: Show Creation Date
preferences.description: Whether to show the creation date of each pin.

preferences.name: showExpiration
preferences.label: Show Expiration Date
preferences.description: Whether to show the expiration date for pins that have one.

preferences.name: showExecutionVisibility
preferences.label: Show Execution Visibility
preferences.description: Whether to show the execution visibility for Terminal command pins

preferences.name: showFragment
preferences.label: Show Text Fragment Icon
preferences.description: Whether to show the icon for text fragment pins

preferences.name: showFrequency
preferences.label: Show Frequency
preferences.description: Whether to show the number of times each pin has been opened

preferences.name: showLastOpened
preferences.label: Show Last Opened
preferences.description: Whether to an indicator on the most recently opened pin

commands.name: view-groups
commands.title: View Pin Groups
commands.description: View and modify groups for pins

preferences.name: showIDs
preferences.title: General Settings
preferences.label: Show IDs
preferences.description: Whether to show the ID for each group.

preferences.name: showSortStrategy
preferences.label: Show Sort Method
preferences.description: Whether to show the sort method for each group.

preferences.name: showParentGroup
preferences.label: Show Parent Group
preferences.description: Whether to show a label for the parent group of each group, if applicable.

commands.name: copy-pins
commands.title: Copy Pin Data
commands.description: Copy all pins and groups in JSON format

commands.name: import-data
commands.title: Import Pin Data
commands.description: Import groups and pins from a JSON string or file

commands.name: check-expirations
commands.title: Check For Expirations
commands.description: Check for expired pins and remove them

preferences.name: showRecentApplications
preferences.label: Show "Recent Applications" Group
preferences.description: Whether to show a "Recent Applications" group in the menu dropdown.

preferences.name: topSection
preferences.title: Section Order
preferences.description: Specifies which section to display first in lists. "Pins First" will show ungrouped pins first, followed by groups. "Groups First" will show groups first, followed by ungrouped pins.

preferences.name: defaultSortStrategy
preferences.title: Default Sort Method
preferences.description: Specifies the default sort method for pins outside of groups.

preferences.name: preferredBrowser
preferences.title: Preferred Browser
preferences.label: Preferred Browser
preferences.description: The browser to use when opening URLs.
